name: Penguin Dance (irafunesta, y_benjamin, LunarMunkey)
description:
This is the submission for the ScoreSpace Jam #23 made with my team.

Dance with the penguin and seals to avoid getting knocked off the ice.

Credits:

Programming by Irafunesta

 Art by y_benjamin

 UX/UI by LunarMunkey (Discord)

"Splash, Jumping, D.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
